metadata.description: They say the Hangman is nothing more than an urban legend. A spook story told to scare criminals straight. But those who encounter him know different. They know that when he comes for you... you're dead already. Join fan-favorite writer Frank Tieri (WOLVERINE, BATMAN) and artist extraordinaire Felix Ruiz (WOLVERINE MAX, HALO) for an ongoing tale of horror, the supernatural and violence...  and learn why some men may never be redeemed.
metadata.name: The Hangman
